tool_description: Capture full-page screenshots of any webpage with a single click, no more tedious, multiple captures.
name: Full Webpage Screenshot
title: Full Webpage Screenshot

api_list.name: Get Screenshot
api_list.description:
This endpoint captures a full-page screenshot of a specified webpage. It supports both desktop and mobile views, providing a screenshot as it would appear on various devices. Screenshots are returned in high-quality PNG format.

Parameters:

url (required): The URL of the webpage you want to capture as a screenshot. This should be a complete URL, including the http:// or https:// protocol.

device (optional): The type of device view you want to emulate when capturing the screenshot. This can either be 'desktop' or 'mobile'. If not specified, 'desktop' view is used by default.
